text:
Arbaaz slams divorce reports

Actor Arbaaz Khan has slammed divorce reports with his longtime wife Malaika Arora Khan by posting a dubsmash video of song Kuch Toh Log Kahenge . The Dabangg 2 director posted the video on his Instagram account, where he features lip-syncing to the song.

“Some people need to mind their business, stop talking and writing bull**** and concentrate on their own miserable lives,” the 48-year-old star captioned the video. There were rumours that Malaika, 42, had moved out of their home with their 13-year-old son.

The couple got married in 1998. They are currently co-hosting a reality TV show “Power Couple”. — PTI
title: ENT-ARBAAZ
